rules: Rule1: If the exhibition is scheduled for June, then either the artwork Mona Lisa is on display or it is not the case that the facility Main Gallery is ready.
Rule2: The exhibition is scheduled for June or funding is secured from patrons.
Rule3: Under the condition that marketing is launched via brochures, if funding is secured from patrons, then either the artwork Mona Lisa is on display or the facility Main Gallery is not ready.
Rule4: Whenever sponsorship is obtained from corporate, then provided that funding is secured from patrons, either the artwork Mona Lisa is on display or the facility Main Gallery is not ready.
Rule5: If staff guides are trained, then either marketing is launched via brochures or sponsorship is obtained from corporate.
Rule6: Either staff guides are trained or volunteers are recruited from locals.
Rule7: Either the event is publicized through media, or if volunteers are recruited from locals, then either marketing is launched via brochures or sponsorship is obtained from corporate.
Rule8: Either tickets are sold to members, or it is not the case that the event is publicized through media.
Rule9: If the artwork Mona Lisa is insured, then the artwork Mona Lisa is authenticated.
Rule10: Either the facility Main Gallery is ready, or if it is not the case that government approval is granted by the Cultural Board, then the artwork Mona Lisa is insured.
Rule11: If the region Paris grants the loan, then it is not the case that the facility Main Gallery is ready.
Rule12: Either the region Paris grants the loan or the job cataloguing is assigned to the curator.
Rule13: Whenever the job cataloguing is assigned to the curator, then the job cataloguing is completed by the curator.
Rule14: If the job cataloguing is completed by the curator, then the facility Main Gallery is not ready.
Rule15: If the region Italy is approved, then whenever the artwork Mona Lisa is selected, if the job cataloguing is assigned to the curator, then the facility Main Gallery is not ready.
Rule16: Either the region Italy is approved or the facility Vault is secured.
Rule17: Provided that the facility Vault is secured, if the artwork Mona Lisa is selected, then if the job cataloguing is assigned to the curator, the facility Main Gallery is not ready.
facts: Fact1: The artwork Mona Lisa is selected.
Fact2: It is not the case that the artwork Mona Lisa is authenticated.
Fact3: The artwork Mona Lisa is not on display.
Fact4: Tickets are not sold to members.

question: Government approval is granted by the Cultural Board.
